lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has asked Ball State officials to investigate new accusations of rules violations involving the men’s team, including an allegation that the women’s volleyball coach was fired for reporting suspected infractions. The allegations were outlined in a letter from the N.C.A.A. dated two days before Coach Ronny Thompson’s resignation July 13 after one season.
